#  Methods

## Tweet

```js
const Meme = require("meme-api");
const memer = new Meme();

const avatar = "https://imgur.com/I5DmdNR.png"; //only static images 
const text = "MEME API IS AWESOME";
const username = "MEME API";

memer.tweet(avatar, username, text).then(image => {
    //now you have a "BUFFER", for Discord create an attachment
      //const attachment = new Discord.MessageAttachment(image, "tweet.png");
      //<Channel>.send(attachment)
})
```

## Youtube

```js
const Meme = require("meme-api");
const memer = new Meme();

const avatar = "https://imgur.com/I5DmdNR.png"; //only static images 
const text = "MEME API IS AWESOME";
const username = "MEME API";

memer.youtube(avatar, username, text).then(image => {
    //now you have a "BUFFER", for Discord create an attachment
      //const attachment = new Discord.MessageAttachment(image, "youtube.png");
      //<Channel>.send(attachment)
})
```

## Bed

```js
const Meme = require("meme-api");
const memer = new Meme()

const avatar1 = "https://imgur.com/I5DmdNR.png"; //only static images 
const avatar2 = "https://imgur.com/wrkBFM8.png"; //only static images 

memer.bed(avatar1, avatar2).then(image => {
    //now you have a "BUFFER", for Discord create an attachment
      //const attachment = new Discord.MessageAttachment(image, "bed.png");
      //<Channel>.send(attachment) 
})
```
